animeDescription: A Shinigami named Baishin who was sealed by Soul Society long ago is set free on Earth. On a fateful day Ichigo encounters him and has roughly half of his reiatsu drained. Its now up to Ichigo and the Soul Society to finally put a stop to Baishin and his destruction.
animeCharacters: ['Kurosaki, Ichigo', 'Kuchiki, Rukia', 'Baishin', 'Zaraki, Kenpachi', 'Urahara, Kisuke', 'Hitsugaya, Toushirou', 'Aizen, Sousuke', 'Kuchiki, Byakuya', 'Shihouin, Yoruichi', 'Ichimaru, Gin']
